name: ECE 135
title: Electromagnetic Fields and Waves
description: Vector analysis. Electrostatic fields. Magnetostatic fields. Time-varying fields and Maxwell's equations. Plane waves. (Formerly EE 135.)

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ECE 101 and ECE 101L; MATH 23B; and MATH 24 or AM 20. Students must concurrently enroll in ECE 135L.

class_notes: Concurrent enrollment in ECE 135L is required.
